definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: The direct bonded restoration has been common technique for the lost structure of the posterior tooth.
sentences.chinese: 直接黏結修復已成爲後牙牙體缺損常見的修復方式。

sentences.english: The bonding may be carried out by hot pressing or by using an adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 粘合可採用熱壓或黏結劑實現。

sentences.english: When used on the road surface, the resin exerts the high bondability characteristic and the like.
sentences.chinese: 而樹脂用在路面時，發揮了高黏結性等特點。

sentences.english: We rough the non-bonding region to reduce the situation that non-bonding region was boned to glass.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們遭遇到非接合區域有些黏結在玻璃上的問題。
